roleset.name: to suppress, repress
roleset.note: STRANGLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'strangle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from strangle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: While by no means the highest crime community in the country , New York is a prime example of a city where crime strangles small-business development [*T*-1] .
